Articles.Content:
<p><img alt="image" src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_nfjwzo17FQ1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><a href="http://bit.ly/15eVDrT"><img alt="image" src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f9f0bb3d839e859d737173f7d6912dfd/tumblr_inline_nfjx3tnHkC1rr2wit.jpg"/></a></p>

<p>"Why play alone, when you can play alone together?" is the creedo of <a href="http://bit.ly/15eVDrT"><strong>KERBAL LIVEFEED</strong></a>, now supported by <strong>Stavell</strong>'s Interstellar Inc. fork. KLF allows you to see the status and map positions of other players in and around the game, as well as share screenshots and engage in chat with them, too. You may still be playing alone, but when others join in on the fun, playing alone together can be a worthwhile experience.</p>

<p>Additional info, requirements, screenshots and downloads can be found <a href="http://bit.ly/15eVDrT"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</p>

<p><em>EDIT: This was scheduled for Monday, yet somehow didn’t run. Either way, enjoy it. It will run at its regular time this coming Monday.</em></p>

Interesting.

I was worried there for a second...
Dang! Impressive that this mod got onto Modding Mondays! Thanks SQUAD! I hope to see more players on the server now.
Wow, never saw that coming . Glad to see it was featured. Maybe it will bring in more people on the server. Setup can be tricky as it isn't documented well.

\o/ i use this mod most of the time, the main server went down for some reason, then someone hosted a new one for a while, which then also went down, and now we have another new server, im happy this mod has survived so long.
